[Posting a day late; I migrated the [proposal tracker](https://github.com/orgs/golang/projects/17) to Projects V2 yesterday and then had to update my minutes maker to add all the new GraphQL API for Projects V2...]

**2022-08-10 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons, @aclements, @julieqiu**

**Accepted**

- **all: decide what can implement TextMarshaler/TextUnmarshaler** [#10275](https://go.dev/issue/10275)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **clarify Go support policy for secondary ports** [#53383](https://go.dev/issue/53383)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **context: add APIs for writing and reading cancelation cause** [#51365](https://go.dev/issue/51365)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net/http: easier access to HTTP/2 error codes** [#53896](https://go.dev/issue/53896)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **strings: add func CommonPrefixLen(x, y string) int** [#53120](https://go.dev/issue/53120)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **x/sync/errgroup: allow manual management of cancel** [#54079](https://go.dev/issue/54079)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **cmd/go: go clean should not accept flags like -modcache with packages** [#53725](https://go.dev/issue/53725)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- none
